Name: FizzBuzz
Description: A program that writes out every number from 1-100 in a row. If the number is divisible with 3 it will replace the number with Fizz. If the number is divisible with 5 it will instead write out Buzz. If it's divisible with both 3 and 5. Then it will write out Fizzbuzz

Name: MVC Portfolio
Description: A basic portfolio site made in visual studio using MVC. Lists projects I've done during the course.

Name: Training Diary
Description: Training diary site built using mvc. Users can add exercises with name and description as well as adding training sessions with date and what exercise they did.

Name: TicTacToe
Description: This is a program built in Visual studios. To emulate the game TicTacToe. TicTacToe is a game where 2 players take turn placing either a cross or a circle and whoever gets 3 in a line wins.

Name: Company Page
Description: This is a project built in Visual studios using MVC with the goal of trying to make a Company page. It has a Homepage, About us, Employee page and Contact page.

Name: Recipe Page MVC
Description: This is a a recipe site built using MVC. It shows the recipes in a list with name, description and image. Every recipe can be clicked on and have it's own page.

Name: Recipe Page SQL
Description: This is another recipe page in Visual studio built using Mvc. But this time the recipes are saved in and accessed from an SQL database. Recipes are shown in a list with each one having their own page through details

Name: Bloggpost SQL
Description: Made in Visual studios. This is another MVC project to simulate a blogg. The data is stored and accessed from an SQL database. Each blogg post has a title, a summary and text. With validation for length for each post

Name: Training Diary SQL
Description: Another MVC project. Using SQL as database. Shows a training diary where you can create training sessions and specifying what type, how many sets, reps and what weight. All of them are interactable and can be edited or removed

Name: Recipe List API
Description: This is a Web API with CRUD operations built in Visual studios. Can be used to Show, Create, Edit and Delete Recipes. Using MongoDb as database.

Name: Blogg Platform API
Description: This is a Web API with CRUD operations for a blogg platform. Can be used to Show, Create, Edit and Delete blogg posts

Name: CV Portfolio Nodejs and Express
Description: This is a very basic portfolio site made using Nodejs, Express and Express handlebars. It got a Homepage, About me, Earlier works and Contact information.

Name: Recipe list with Express and Node js
Description: This is a recipe list site made with express, node js and express handlebars. It shows a list of recipes in a list. It also got CRUD operations so you can Create, Show, Edit and Delete each recipe

Name: Restaurant Page with VueJS
Description: This is a restaurant page built with VueJS. It got a Homepage, Lunch menu and a contact page

Name: Blogg Site with VueJS
Description: This is a blogg site built with VueJS. On the frontpage you can see all posts and if you click on the posts you get to a page with just that blogg post.

Name: Todo list with VueJS
Description: This is a Todo list made with VueJS. On the frontpage you can see all current todos' as well as create new ones with an input field and a button. Every todo has a title and can be checked as cleared and also deleted.

Name: Web Store with VueJS
Description: This is a web store site made with VueJS. On the frontpage you can see all products with image, name and price. If you click on a product you get to another page where you can select amount as well as a buy button.

Name: Loan CRUD API
Description: This is an extension of the BookAPI that was made during the lesson. Where I added a Loan model and CRUD operations to it.

Name: Blogg API
Description: This is an API of blogg posts built in Visual studios with data stored in SQL. It has CRUD operations and every post has a Title, Content and Date.

Name: Blogg Frontend and Backend
Description: This is a follow up to the Blogg post API. Where I create the Frontend of it and connect it to my API. It's built with VueJS and a user can see all the posts, Create new ones, edit and delete posts.

Name: Todo List Front and Backend
Description: This is an improvement of the earlier todo list. Here i built the backend in visual studios with CRUD operations. Data from Sql and the frontend is built with Vue. Every todo has a title, a date and can be marked as finished. A user can create, show, edit and delete posts in the app
